thread.title: Matfield out, Pietersen returns for Springboks for quarters
thread.title_full: Matfield out, Pietersen returns for Springboks for quarters - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Matfield out, Pietersen returns for Springboks for quarters
text:
LONDON: Veteran lock Victor Matfield will miss the Rugby World Cup quarterfinals after failing to overcome a hamstring injury, meaning there'll be only one change in South Africa's starting line-up for Saturday's match against Wales.
JP Pietersen , who missed the 64-0 win over the United States in South Africa's last Pool B match because of a knee injury, will return on the right wing in place of Lwazi Mvovo and Bryan Habana will go back to the left wing.
The South Africans wingers have nine tries between them at the tournament, with Habana equalling Jonah Lomu's all-time record of 15 World Cup tries with his five so far in 2015.
There are four changes on South Africa's bench, with Adriaan Strauss, Jannie du Plessis, Ruan Pienaar and Pat Lambie all returning.
